00038     WIN_HAMMING = 0,    // max attenuation 53 dB
00039     WIN_HANN = 1,       // max attenuation 44 dB
00040     WIN_BLACKMAN = 2,   // max attenuation 74 dB
00041     WIN_RECTANGULAR = 3
00042   };
